monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: Every Buff, Shield or Heal action of an ally additionally applies one random Buff.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: The Critical Chance and Critical Damage of every consecutive hit during an ability is increased by 2.5% continuously.  (For a 4 hit attack it is +0%, +2.5%, +5%, +7.5%)

skills.name: Aerial Strike
skills.description: 4 x 90% (360%) physical damage (wind) applies Sidekick (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Aerial Strike Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 115% (460%) physical damage (wind) applies Sidekick & Might (Buffs) to itself

skills.name: Armor Bypass
skills.description: This Monster's attacks ignore 20% of the target's Defense damage reduction value.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Auto Heal
skills.description: When attacking, also heal the Monster with the lowest health in the party by 200% of Magic.

skills.name: Beating
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 45% (270%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 4
skills.description: 7 x 50% (350%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 5
skills.description: 8 x 55% (440%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Bleed
skills.description: Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt.

skills.name: Blizzard
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Chill (Debuff).

skills.name: Buff Charging
skills.description: When this Monster applies a Buff, it gains a Charge stack.

skills.name: Cascade
skills.description: The power of every consecutive hit during an ability is increased by 5% continuously. (For a 4 hit attack: +0%, +5%, +10%, +15%)

skills.name: Charge Amplifier
skills.description: Aura: All Charge stacks in the party are 33% stronger.

skills.name: Chilling Wind
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Chilling Wind Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Chilling Wind Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Chilling Wind Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Chilling Wind Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 75% (450%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Combo Buffing
skills.description: Every Buff action applies one additional random Buff.

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Apex
skills.description: The Critical Chance and Critical Damage of every consecutive hit during an ability is increased by 2.5% continuously.  (For a 4 hit attack it is +0%, +2.5%, +5%, +7.5%)

skills.name: Critical Defense
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by 10% of own Critical Damage value.

skills.name: Critical Edge
skills.description: Each Critical Hit grants this Monster a Charge stack.

skills.name: Critical Hybridization
skills.description: The first critical hit of a physical attack triggers an additional hit equal to 60% of Magic value and vice versa.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Dodging
skills.description: Increases chance to dodge enemy hits by 8%.

skills.name: Earth Weakness
skills.description: Earth damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Feather Hurricane
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) physical damage (wind) Hits all enemies Applies Might (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Feather Storm
skills.description: 6 x 25% (150%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Feather Storm Lvl 2
skills.description: 6 x 35% (210%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Feather Storm Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 45% (270%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Feather Storm Lvl 4
skills.description: 7 x 50% (350%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Feather Storm Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 65% (455%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Heroic Party
skills.description: Aura: Every Monster in the party deals 1% increased damage for each Buff on it.

skills.name: Heroism
skills.description: Deals 2% increased damage for every Buff on this Monster.

skills.name: Holy Presence
skills.description: Aura: Every Buff, Shield or Heal action of an ally additionally applies one random Buff.

skills.name: Hunt
skills.description: Aura: Increases the Critical Chance of the whole party by 4%.

skills.name: Hybrid Mastery
skills.description: Increases Attack by 10% of this Monster's Magic and increases Magic by 10% of this Monster's Attack.

skills.name: Hybrid Shield
skills.description: At the start of combat, apply a Shield equal to 100% of Attack and Magic value.

skills.name: Ice Storm
skills.description: 1 x 160% magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Ice Storm Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 210% magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Ice Storm Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Improved Sidekick
skills.description: Unique Aura: Sidekick (Buff) damage increased by an additional 50%.

skills.name: Initial Chill
skills.description: Apply Chill (Debuff) to a random enemy at the start of combat.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magic Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Magic value.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Might
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Pecking Order
skills.description: Aura: Every attack of a Bird triggers an additional hit equal to 30% of Attack or Magic value. (Depending on the attack)

skills.name: Phoenix Affinity
skills.description: When this Monster is knocked out for the first time in combat, it is revived with 10% of its Max Health.

skills.name: Power
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party Applies Sorcery (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Power Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party Applies Sorcery (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Power Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Might & Sorcery (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Sidekick
skills.description: Applies Sidekick (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Strike Mastery
skills.description: This monster can receive an additional Stack of Might, Sorcery and Sidekick. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Sub Zero
skills.description: Unique Aura: Chill causes enemies affected by it to take 10% increased damage.

skills.name: Teamplay
skills.description: Applies Sidekick (Buff) to whole party Applies Barrier (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Teamplay Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Sidekick (Buff) to whole party Applies Barrier (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Teamplay Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Sidekick & Barrier (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Typhoon Cut
skills.description: 6 x 90% (540%) physical damage (wind) applies Glory, Sidekick & Agility (Buffs) to itself

skills.name: Wind Resistance
skills.description: Wind damage reduced by 50%

drops.name: Monster Bell
drops.description: Respawns all defeated wild Monsters immediately
